title: FS: T202 Evers Makes a Safe Slide PSA-5: $650
author: robw1959

posts.post_title: FS: T202 Evers Makes a Safe Slide PSA-5: $650
posts.post_content: The famed Cubs trio all on one card. Razor-sharp corners, decent centering, this card presents a very high-grade issue on front. Only a bit of wear on the reverse accounts for the grade of EX-5. $650 by PayPal gift preferred. Contact me at [url]rjweekes@yahoo.com[/url]
